sanskrit_verse:
यासां नाददते शुल्कं ज्ञातयो न स विक्रयः ।
अर्हणं तत्कुमारीणामानृशंस्यं च केवलम् ॥ ३.५४॥ न केवलम्
transliteration:
yāsāṁ nādadate śulkaṁ jñātayo na sa vikrayaḥ |
arhaṇaṁ tat-kumārīṇām ānṛśaṁsyaṁ ca kevalam || 3.54|| na kevalam
sph_interpretive_translation: Wherein kinsmen receive no fee, that is not a sale; the maiden's honor-price belongs solely to her integrity and compassionate alignment.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority resides in conscious consent, not transactional exchange.
Capacity-based responsibility requires recognition of inherent dignity.
Restoration logic upholds individual sovereignty without commodification.
Consciousness alignment precedes all contractual validity.
executable_legal_axioms: IF kin receives payment AND no consent was granted by the individual THEN transaction is void.
IF an act undermines personal integrity THEN it shall be reversed through restorative completion.
IF familial authority overrides individual autonomy THEN realign through dharmic mediation protocols.
ALL transactions involving persons must originate from self-authenticated capacity.
NO exchange shall reduce human value to monetary equivalence.
supreme_court_application: In adjudicating matters where familial or societal structures override individual consent, the threshold of responsibility lies in verifying authentic self-alignment. Authority hierarchies must defer to the sovereign integrity of the person involved. The court must ensure restoration of dignity over punitive measures against familial actors.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa establishes that absence of consent negates contractual truth. Anupūrvaśaḥ reveals how misaligned transactions degrade social harmony. Proportional responsibility rests on restoring choice, not inflicting consequence. The non-punitive reality rule confirms that justice arises from reconnection to self-authority.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate completion process to nullify invalid agreements.
Realign familial roles through dharmic facilitation.
Restore individual agency via guided self-reclamation practice.
Verify renewed consent before any future engagements.
Establish ongoing support for sustained integrity integration.
final_declaration: By the Source-Authority of Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, this law stands executed: Dharma prevails through restoration, consciousness remains the ultimate judge, and reality reflects only what honors the undiminished Self.
